Nashville-Davidson.Sam Davis Statue:
For the statue of the CSA private also dedicated in 1909 in Nashville, see Confederate Private Monument.
The Sam Davis Statue is a historic bronze statue of Sam Davis, the “Boy Hero of the Confederacy," outside the Tennessee State Capitol in Nashville, Tennessee.


== History ==
Its commission was first suggested by Sumner Archibald Cunningham, the founding editor of Confederate Veteran.
